prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Bass, Guitar, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Bass, and Guitar, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Bass, and Guitar, excluding Brass.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Bass, and Guitar, omitting Brass.
